data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus - iOS 12 & iPad Air 2 - iOS 12.1 Public Beta 1
data.expected_result: You should get the option to copy the ID of the DM.
data.short_description: Long holding a DM/Group DM doesn't give the option to copy the ID
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure Dev Mode is enabled - Open your DMs - Long hold a DM or Group DM
